lines.text: Whoever brings me a little bird can be my fella.
Aw! The poor putty tats! They faw down and go boom!
I get wid of more putty tats dat way!
Come with me to the Casbah, incognito.

[as the lady cat await a kiss]
Ladies and gentlemen, I don't actually belong in this picture. But I can't pass up a chance like *this*!
Everybody wants to get into the act! Umbriago! It's disgusting!
I tat I taw a puddytat. I tat I taw another puddytat. I did, I did! I taw two puddytats. Have you two puddytats met?
Here comes the little naked genius now.
